abstract: If Johnson & Johnson — or anyone else, for that matter — is thinking about making a play for Schering-Plough, here’s a number worth considering: $1.25 billion.
lead_paragraph: If Johnson & Johnson — or anyone else, for that matter — is thinking about making a play for Schering-Plough, here’s a number worth considering: $1.25 billion.

headline.main: For Merck and Schering, Goodbye Could Cost $1.25 Billion
